info.title: getnodeaddresses example
info.description: This is an API example for getnodeaddresses, a method to return known addresses of network peers. This can  be used to help new nodes in finding peers to connect to.

items.description: The number of addresses to return. If 0 is specified, the node will return all known  addresses.

200.description: A list of known network peer addresses.

services.description: The services offered by the peer.

time.description: The last time the address was seen.
